title: ITC Fonts: ITC OpenType Complete Family Packs
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811193018/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 24.May.2006 5.05am 

International Typeface Corporation  
Impressions Webcard  
May 2006  
ITCFonts.com: [http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2446&et=T&s=47007&da=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811193018/http:/msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2446&et=T&s=47007&da=0 "http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2446&et=T&s=47007&da=0")

Here at ITCFonts.com we pride ourselves on continuously growing our collection of ITC OpenType Complete Family Packages. With OpenType’s advanced features including cross-platform compatibility, automated character substitution and expanded character sets it’s easy to see why people are buying the Complete Family Packs in this popular new format.

Some of our most popular ITC Complete Family Packs available in OpenType include:

ITC Franklin Gothic: [http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2448&et=T&s=47007&da=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811193018/http:/msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2448&et=T&s=47007&da=0 "http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2448&et=T&s=47007&da=0")

ITC Avant Garde Gothic: [http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2460&et=T&s=47007&da=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811193018/http:/msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2460&et=T&s=47007&da=0 "http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2460&et=T&s=47007&da=0")

ITC Legacy Pro: [http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2461&et=T&s=47007&da=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811193018/http:/msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2461&et=T&s=47007&da=0 "http://msg1svc.net/servlet/Gateway?p=AGFAITC&u=2461&et=T&s=47007&da=0")
